body.name: Handheld Game Console with 400 FC Games-Retro Game Console- Portable Video Game Console, Support for Connecting TV & Two Players, 1020mAh Rechargeable Battery. (Blue)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 27 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
FREE delivery Tuesday, February 27 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: 【400 Classic FC Games】This mini retro handheld FC game console features classic game style. Classic FC games let you play 400 games without any ads or extra costs, including arcade retro games, puzzle solving, arcade, shooting, racing, fighting, adventure and more. Each game is a classic of your childhood

【Classic Portable Design】Compact and lightweight body design, ultra-compact size, equipped with optimized system for higher stability and excellent gaming experience. 2.8 inch display, you can see more details and beautiful scene games. It is very convenient to carry with you whether you are traveling on business, traveling or camping.

【Support two players and connect to TV】The box includes a console and a gamepad, with the extra handle, you can connect to a small handheld console for two player games. The 3-inch LCD screen can be connected to a TV via AV output, so you can easily enjoy vivid and exciting video games on the big TV screen.

【Perfect gift for children/adults】The game console not only brings fun and joyful game time, but also brings us some childhood memories, exercises children's coordination skills and releases adult stress. It's the perfect gift for birthdays and Christmas.

【Portable Retro Game Console】Built-in 1020mAh high-capacity lithium battery. After each full charge, the game can be played for up to 6-8 hours. You can take it with you when you travel, work, camping or other outdoor activities.
body.description: Feature:Funny present:Our retro handheld game consoles can be fun gifts for birthdays, April Fools, Christmas, Halloween and themed parties where you can play with your friends or family for a fun experience.Specification:Include 400 classical gamesProduct Size: 3X4.52X0.78 InchBox size: 6.7X6.3X2.3 InchProduct weight: 9.5 ozColor: as shown in picturesPackage content:1 x Retro FC Game Console1 x Gamepad1 x User Manual1x rechargeable battery1 x USB Cable1 x AV Output CableNote:We are working hard to create a safe, healthy and comfortable life style.We will put more products on the shelf in the hope of making your life better with your family.Manual measurement, please allow slight errors on size.The colors may exist slight difference due to different screens.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 3.5 3.5 out of 5 stars 135 ratings 3.5 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Christmas gift for someone who enjoys games
reviews.reviewText: This gaming system is such a great price for someone who appreciates all the original arcade games. There is literally over 400!! It’s such a great price & a very special unique gift for someone who enjoys gaming.Also DOESNT need wifi or internet. Battery lasts very long. It’s a great purchase & find. I’m so glad I got this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Save your money
reviews.reviewText: I brought 2 as Christmas gifts. One for my son and one for my daughter. I brought 2 different colors....they just decided to open it to play with it. They wanted to connect it to the big screen TV. My daughters av cord broke off in the tv soon as I plugged it in and now it's stuck. So I grabbed my son's cord and plugged it into my tv in my room, it connected well but none of their controllers work. So while it's connected she has to use the gameboy to controll it not the remote like it's suppose to...only reason I'm not sending it back is because she's enjoying it. But it's my money that paid for it and if I pay for something I expect it to work how my card worked to pay for it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Sweet old school games
reviews.reviewText: A cheap and inexpensive way to time travel to childhood memories.This particular console has Mario Bros and Contra, two of my favorites growing up.The battery lasts long enough for me to try and be as good as I was when I was in school.Perfect to show off to my kids and to carry around in the car to kill time waiting for friends who are always late 😂

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars fun but flimsy
reviews.reviewText: bought for some nostalgia to take on a camping trip. battery life is pretty decent, display is great sound is good. Controls is where it starts to fall apart. The Dpad wouldn't register at up and right angle, the buttons had a slight delay. in an intense game the plastic was thin enough that I thought my thumb might punch thru the whole unit. DOES NOT have 400 games. maybe about 130 until it starts duplicating, or having the same game, but in Chinese and Japanese. After day 5 the charging port snapped off the circuit board. I considered fixing it, but in the end I don't think it's worth it, I got my 15 bucks out of it for all the Mario I played. I am certain I spent at least that much in a single day at the arcade in quarters as a kid. I wouldn't buy another one though, I think I'll do an upgrade with the thumbsticks and PS1 games.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works really good! Great price!
reviews.reviewText: I bought one to try it out, it seemed too good to be true. It has 400 games with a few repeats, it works really good, it’s cheap and lite weight and the games are good quality. Rechargeable battery lasts a long time. It works so good, I came back and bought 3 more for my grandkids. The only problem is with the black case, the black color makes it hard to read the button’s labels.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's cool and old school
reviews.reviewText: The controller works when u hit 2 players and it does work on the TV it is great

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Poor product with cheap parts. On/off switch broke immediately. Purchased for a gift and lost opportunity for refund. Would not recommend this product or similar products through this brand due to poor and disappointing quality. Would give 0/5 stars if able.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars no user manual
reviews.reviewText: mine came with nothing, no user manual or anything just console, av cable and a black cord and controller that doesnt work.
